author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Official Trailer for Greenland 2: Migration, an action thriller distributed by STX Entertainment, Thunder Road Pictures, and Lionsgate. Embark on a journey with Gerard Butler, Morena Baccarin, and Roman Griffin Davis as Earth hangs in the balance after an apocalyptic event ravages the planet. Greenland 2: Migration is in theaters on January 9, 2026.

In the aftermath of a comet strike that decimated most of the Earth, GREENLAND 2: MIGRATION follows the Garrity family (Gerard Butler, Morena Baccarin, and Roman Griffin Davis) as they’re forced to leave the safety of their bunker in Greenland to traverse a shattered world in search of a new home.

Greenland 2: Migration stars Gerard Butler, Morena Baccarin, Roman Griffin Davis, Amber Rose Revah, Sophie Thompson, Trond Fausa Aurvåg, William Abadie, and more. The film is written by Chris Sparling and Mitchell LaFortune, alongside the film being directed by Ric Roman Waugh.

Greenland 2: Migration is in theaters on January 9,
title: Greenland 2: Migration - Official Trailer (2025) Gerard Butler

author: IGN
description:
Check out gameplay from Final Fantasy Tactics: The Ivalice Chronicles in both the new Enhanced mode and Classic Mode. The enhanced version is based on the original Final Fantasy Tactics, but features full voice acting, and animated character portraits and enhanced graphics. The classic version is intended to be a faithful representation of the original 1997 release of Final Fantasy Tactics. 

00:00 - Enhanced mode 
15:21 - Classic Mode

#IGN #Gaming 

Gameplay Captured on a PS5 Pro
title: Final Fantasy Tactics: The Ivalice Chronicles - 22 Minutes of Enhanced & Classic Gameplay 4K

author: IGN
description:
Watch the trailer for The Astronaut, an upcoming sci-fi psychological thriller movie starring Kate Mara, Laurence Fishburne, Gabriel Luna, Ivana Milicevic, Macy Gray, and introducing Scarlett Holmes.

When astronaut Sam Walker (Kate Mara) crash lands back to Earth, she’s discovered alive in a punctured capsule off the Atlantic coast. General William Harris (Laurence Fishburne) places her in quarantine under strict NASA surveillance for rehabilitation and testing. But as disturbing events escalate, she begins to fear that something extraterrestrial has followed her home.

The Astronaut is produced by Brad Fuller, Eric B. Fleischman, Chris Abernathy, and Cameron Fuller.

The Astronaut, written and directed by Jess Varley, opens in theaters on October 17, 2025.
title: The Astronaut - Official Trailer (2025) Kate Mara, Laurence Fishburne

Learn more about Roathe in The Old Peace expansion for Warframe, coming in 2025 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, iOS, and PC.

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at the Path to Tamer Town announcement trailer for this roguelite monster-taming adventure game, and standalone prequel to the upcoming city builder Tamer Town. In Path to Tamer Town, travel from city to city, earn badges, and build your team of Mokitons in a procedurally generated world. Each run brings new challenges, choices, and surprises--all leading up to the ultimate Stadium Showdown. Path to Tamer Town will be available in Steam Early Access in Q1 2026, with Steam version 1.0, PC (Windows), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X/S, and Nintendo Switch 2 in Q3 2026.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Path to Tamer Town - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Join Team Ninja as they explain how Ninja Gaiden 4 is staying true to its punishing roots while also providing more options. Dynamic enemy placement and aggressive AI scales with difficulty levels, ensuring things stay as tense as you need them to be. And for new players inexperienced in Ninja Gaiden's fast-paced battles, a new hero mode and adjustable assists will help ease you into the experience. Ninja Gaiden 4 will be available on Xbox Series X/S, Xbox on PC, Xbox Cloud, Steam, and PlayStation 5 (PS5) on October 21, 2025.

description: NAMMO is a soulslike boss rush game that, according to developer Guild Studio, is "set during Korea’s Silla Dynasty, which spanned from 57 BC to AD 935 (nearly a millennium). It combines a dark fantasy world with a Soulslike boss-rush experience." Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3863810/NAMMO/
title: NAMMO -  Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Xbox has raised console prices yet again, five years into this generation. In this episode of Unlocked, we dig into what the latest Xbox Series X|S price hike means for players, whether the higher-than-ever costs can be justified, and how this compares to PlayStation and Nintendo’s pricing strategies. We also look at the bigger picture: does Xbox risk losing fans by increasing hardware prices while still trying to expand Game Pass and first-party exclusives?

#Xbox #XboxSeriesX #IGN #gaming
title: Five Years In, Xbox Is More Expensive Than Ever - Unlocked Clips

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Ghost of Yotei launch trailer for this upcoming action-adventure game featuring a new story of a warrior in Japan who is on a mission of vengeance all her own. Set 300 years after Ghost of Tsushima, Ghost of Yōtei is a standalone experience set in 1600s rural Japan. The story follows a haunted, lone mercenary named Atsu. Thirsty for revenge, she travels through the beautiful, rugged landscapes of northern Japan, hunting those who killed her family many years earlier. Ghost of Yotei will be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5) on October 2, 2025.

#GhostOfYotei #Gaming #IGN
title: Ghost of Yotei - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Official Trailer #2 for Avatar: Fire and Ash, the third installment in James Cameron's sci-fi drama action films distributed by 20th Century Studios. Venture to a new tribe on the planet of Pandora, a tribe that leads by fire and rage as their north star in all manners of life. Avatar: Fire and Ash is in theaters worldwide in IMAX 3D, Dolby Cinema 3D, RealD 3D, Cinemark XD, 4DX, ScreenX, and premium screens everywhere on December 19, 2025.

With Avatar: Fire and Ash, James Cameron takes audiences back to Pandora in an immersive new adventure with Marine turned Na’vi leader Jake Sully, Na’vi warrior Neytiri, and the Sully family. 

Avatar: Fire and Ash stars Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldaña, Sigourney Weaver, Stephen Lang, and more. The film is directed by James Cameron alongside the screenplay by James Cameron & Rick Jaffa & Amanda Silver. The story is by James Cameron & Rick Jaffa & Amanda Silver & Josh Friedman & Shane Salerno, also stars Sigourney Weaver, Stephen Lang, Oona C
title: Avatar: Fire and Ash - Official Trailer #2 (2025) Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldaña, Sigourney Weaver

author: IGN
description: Get a look at a whole bunch of gameplay from Yooka-Replaylee, the upcoming remastered 3D platformer from some of the original creators of Banjo-Kazooie, running on Nintendo Switch 2. Yooka-Replaylee will be released on October 9 for Nintendo Switch 1 and 2, Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 5, and PC. Wishlist it – and/or play the free demo – on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2448020/YookaReplaylee/
title: Yooka-Replaylee: 24 Minutes of Nintendo Switch 2 Footage

author: IGN
description:
Ghost of Yotei reviewed by Michael Higham on PlayStation 5.

A predictable but well-executed story takes you through Ghost of Yotei's gorgeous landscapes and satisfying, fluid action. With a strong lead in Atsu as a vigilante who does not care about honor in her quest for revenge, you get a stronger lead character and an expanded toolset that elevates the principles set by Tsushima. Although the novelty has lost a bit of its sheen, the Kurosawa imitation is still strong and used to great effect. So while it may not be transforming open world games, Ghost of Yotei is a superb distillation of the samurai fantasy.
title: Ghost of Yotei Review
